Title: Makes certain provisions relating to the closure or transfer of a state-operated individualized residential alternative permanent
Summary: Makes certain provisions relating to the closure or transfer of a state-operated individualized residential alternative permanent.
LawCode: Amd Part Q ยง2, Chap 59 of 2016
ActClause: AN ACT to amend part Q of chapter 59 of the laws of 2016, amending the mental hygiene law relating to the closure or transfer of a state-operated individualized residential alternative, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
